src:
Šta Partizan dobija sa Belom?
Solidan šut, preuzimanje u odbrani i igru u tranziciji pre svega
01 Nov 2019 by Strahinja Klisarić

Partizan je na svom zvaničnom sajtu potvrdio da je Džejms Bel potpisao i postao novi član crno-belih.

Tražio je Parni valjak pojačanje na poziciji beka još od letos, posle dobrih rezultata nije žurio sa dovođenjem igrača, vremenom se uvidelo da je potreban igrač u ekipi koji će da igra na pozicijama i dva i tri, posle ne tako sjajnih igara Žanisa Pejnersa, pa je sa te strane gledano Bel logično rešenje.
Radi se o krilnom košarkašu koji je bio diplomac prestižnog Univerziteta Vilanova. Započeo je seniorsku karijeru u Kremoni, da bi potom igrao i za Nansi, Hapoel Holon, Darušafaku i abaligaše, Cedevitu i Budućnost. Igrajući za Darušafaku, Bel je 2018. godine osvojio Evrokup, dok je u dresu Budućnosti, minule sezone osvojio nacionalno prvenstvo i kup Crne Gore.



Bel je visok 196 centimetara i mogao bi da pomogne crno-belima pre svega sa šutem za tri poena što je bila varljiva kategorija kod crno-belih do sada. Recimo, protiv Limoža su ubacili samo četiri iz 18 pokušaja.
Voli Bel često da ostane sam u ćošku i da pripali trojku u situacijama u kojim bi recimo Pejners često oklevao da šutne i pokušavao bi da uđe u reket i proba tako da nastavi akciju. Svi koji su ga gledali u Darušafaki znaju da se radi o solidnom šuteru i kroz te procente će se najviše ocenjivati njegov učinak u redovima crno-belih.



Kvalitet mu je što poseduje sposobnost da, kada je to potrebno, sam sebi iskreira situaciju ili za prodor ili za šut za tri poena što mu je takođe plus.
Po dobrim fizikalijama se uklapa u ekipu crno-belih, može da preuzima i to mu je plus, tako da ako Belov voljni momenat i u tom aspektu bude bio kako treba crno-beli će dosta profitirati.


Džejms Bel stiže u Partizan


Voli situacije posle promašaja protivničkih napada, voli da istrči u kontri, a to je pokazao i u Evroligi na utakmicama kao što su bile one protiv CSKA ili Barselone.
U dresu Budućnosti, u 28 utakmica ABA lige, imao je prosek od 8,3 poena i 2,7 skokova i 1,1 asistencije. Nije to neki spektakl, ali ako ga trojke budu išle mogao bi mnogo da pomogne crno-belima.



Partizan dovodi igrača koji je slobodan, početak je novembra, biće mu potrebno malo vremena da se navikne, ali mnogo toga će, kada se podvuče crta, zavisiti od njegove igre u odbrani i šuta za tri poena. On mu je varirao tokom karijere, a dok je igrao za  Cedevitu u Evrokupu je imao 36,2%. 
Najbolje procente u Evrokupu imao je igrajući za Nansi - 41,7%, a u Darušafaki ispod 30%. Videćemo u kakvoj će formi biti u crno-belom dresu.
Kao osvajač Evrokupa ima pedigre, a Partizan je sa njim ove sezone dobio dodatnu snagu i "meso" na parketu. Ako se to sve uigra, neće protivnicima biti lako da napadaju odbranu koja je i bez Bela delovalo prilično solidno u dosadašnjem delu sezone.
Igrao je u ABA ligi, poznaje ovo podneblje, a sa tim bi i period adaptacije trebalo da prođe brže. Partizan je od večeras još snažniji. Nova dobra vest za pristalice crno-belih.









FOTO: KK Partizan
text:
What does Partizan get with Bella?
Solid shot, takeover on defense and transition game above all
01 Nov 2019 by Strahinja Klisaric

Partizan confirmed on its official website that James Bell signed and became a new member of black and white.

He has been looking for a Steam Roller boost at the back position since this year, after good results he was in no hurry to bring players, over time it became clear that he needed a player on the team to play at positions two and three, after the not so great games of Jeanis Payners, and it is from this side that Bel logical solution is viewed.
It is a wing basketball player who was a graduate of the prestigious Vilanova University. He began his senior career at Cremona, and later played for Nancy, Hapoel Holon, Darushafaka and the Abaligas, Cedevita and Future. Playing for Darushafaka, Belle won the Euro Cup in 2018, while in the Future jersey, last season he won the national championship and the Cup of Montenegro.



Bel is 196 inches tall and could help black and whites first and foremost with a three-point shot, which has been a deceptive category for black and whites so far. For example, they only scored four of 18 attempts against Limoges.
He often likes to stay alone in the corner and get a trio in situations where, for example, Payners would often hesitate to keep quiet and try to get into the racket and try again to continue the action. Everyone who has watched it in Darushafaka knows that it is a solid shooter and through these percentages will be judged most by its performance in the ranks of black and white.



His quality is that he has the ability to create the situation when needed, either for penetration or for a three-point shot, which is also a plus.
By good physics he fits into the team of black and whites, he can take over and that is a plus for him, so if Bell's willing moment and in that aspect is right, black and whites will profit a lot.


James Bell arrives in Partizan


He likes situations after missing opponents' attacks, he likes to run in the counter, and he showed that in the Euroleague at games such as those against CSKA or Barcelona.
In the jersey of the Future, in 28 ABA league games, he averaged 8.3 points and 2.7 rebounds and 1.1 assists. It's not a spectacle, but if the three of them go, it could help a lot of black and whites.



Partizan brings in a free agent, it is the beginning of November, it will take some time to get used to it, but much of that, when he draws a line, will depend on his playing defense and kicking for three points. He varied throughout his career, and while playing for Cedevita in Eurocup he had 36.2%.
He had the best percentages in Eurocup playing for Nancy - 41.7%, and in Darushafaka below 30%. We will see in what form it will be in black and white jersey.
As a Eurocup winner, he has pedigrees, and Partizan has gained extra power and "meat" on the floor this season. If that all works out, it won't be easy for opponents to attack a defense that, even without Bel, has worked pretty solidly so far this season.
He has played in the ABA league, knows this climate, and with that the adaptation period should go faster. Partizan is even stronger as of tonight. New good news for black and white supporters.









PHOTO: BC Partizan
